titles.title: Retirement Investment in Small Employers Act
Retirement Investment in Small Employers Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a microemployer pension plan startup credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Retirement Investment in Small Employers Act
This bill allows an increased start-up tax credit (from $500 to $2,500) for micro-businesses (not more than 10 employees) for the costs of setting up a defined contribution pension plan.
